entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
